title: Vampire Hotel
description: Lance would like to think he's like any other guy but after escaping a mental hospital with a vampire on his trail , he's inclined to settle on a less weird. Finding refuge in a small South Dakota town Lance tries to regain his past without becoming too attached to the locals. Can Lance recover his past before vampires suck the small town dry, or worse spend the rest of his life in a small town?
author: Roger Huntman
